description: This scene presents a surreal rocket launch where a man communicates instructions via walkie-talkie for initiating pressure from a spigot attached to a giant, furry wall. A long hose runs from this peculiar structure towards a space rocket labeled "USA," suggesting this mundane connection provides the power for lift-off. The casual command to "start the pressure nice and easy" highlights the ironic contrast between the high-stakes endeavor of a rocket launch and the low-tech, absurd means of propulsion. The presence of the inexplicable furry wall as the power source introduces an element of pure absurdity into the technological setting.
caption: "Okay, Pete! Start the pressure nice and easy."
